name: Hentai Sokoban
description:
Hentai Sokoban is puzzle game, in which the player pushes boxes here and there in a warehouse trying to get them to their storage locations.

Each time you succeed, you get the girls picture and Steam Achievements."Hentai Sokoban" is a logical game featuring:
  • nice artwork
  • relaxing background music
  • classic game mechanic
  • 9 Levels
  • Steam achievements
